pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Fiducial Inference for Low-Dimensional Robust Linear Regression // Fiducial framework for linear regression models allowing normal, Student, Cauchy, or logistic error terms. Only low-dimensional models are possible, such as the simple linear regression model, or the one-way ANOVA model with two factor levels. Reference: Hannig, Lai Lee (2014) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2013.03.003.
